name: loyally
content:

in a way that shows firm and continuing friendship or support for someone or something: His wife supported him loyally whatever he did. Supporters loyally defended their sport. See
loyal
More examplesFewer examplesThe minister has served loyally in several departments.She had loyally followed my instructions.He stuck loyally by my side through one legal battle after another.
